column1: Master of Science in Applied Economics (MScAECON)
column5: OverviewThe Master of Science in Applied Economics (MScAEcon) is a one-year full-time programme that equips students with economics knowledge to analyze the changing world economy.
column7: (1) Non-local students: HKD$ 188,000 (2) Local students: HKD$ 138,000 Note: Tuition fee is subject to annual review.
